regCommonP: Create an account to use the services and it was easier.
regteamP: Fill in the details to create a team profile.
regorganizerP: Fill in the details to create a organizer profile.
regathleteP: Fill in the details to create a athlete profile.

team.athleteModerationP2: e.g. when an athlete selects a team in the profile, the team approves the athlete as a member of the selected team

login.loginP: To access, please login with your account details

recover.forgotPasswordP: Enter your email address and we will send you a link to reset your password

avatar.avaExample: The photo is shown, for example, next to your profile
avatar.avatarSize: We recommend using an image of at least 600x600 pixels in PNG format.
avatar.avatarCapacity: The recommended size of the image is no more than 4 MB.

common.terms1Part: By registering, you confirm that you accept our

validation.webSiteUrl: Website must be a valid URL
validation.passwordRules: The password must be at least 8 characters long, including one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter, and one number
